#### Exercise C - 8 mins 1. Create two html pages. Call one index.html and the other about.html. 2. On the index.html page put an image that links to the about.html website. 3. If the user clicks on the image he/she should end up on the about.html page. 4. On the about.html site put an email address, link that up as well. If the user clicks on the email, your mail program on your laptop should open.
